select count(0) FROM db_kindergarten.tb_group_class c left join tb_system_user u on c.createBy = u.userId left join tb_group_classtype ct on c.classTypeId = ct.classTypeId left join tb_orgmgt_garten g on c.gartenId = g.gartenId where 1=1
and c.description like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{description}),'%')
and className like '%${className}%'
and c.classTypeId = #{classTypeId}
and c.gartenId = #{gartenId}
and STR_TO_DATE(c.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and STR_TO_DATE(c.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
